titles.title: The Spirit of the Lord is great and mighty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The spirit of the lord is great and mighty
the spirit of the lord is my victory
the spirit of the lord is great and mighty
great and mighty is he

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
greater is he that is in me than he that is world
and i am more than a conqueror by the power of his word,
of his word

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
in the name of Jesus i can do anything
by the power of his spirit, he's the one who strengthens me,
strengthens me
